OMX Sales.description: AI-powered sales command center with CRM integration, lead scoring, and automated workflows

OMX Flow.description: WhatsApp Business automation platform with chatbot builder and campaign tools

faqs.question: What makes OMX Sales different from other CRMs?
faqs.answer: OMX Sales combines AI-powered lead scoring with built-in multi-channel communication and real-time analytics - all in one unified platform.

faqs.question: Can I use my existing WhatsApp number with OMX Flow?
faqs.answer: Yes! We guide you through migrating your current WhatsApp Business number to OMX Flow with zero downtime.

faqs.question: How quickly can I get started?
faqs.answer: Most customers are fully operational within 48 hours. Our onboarding team provides personalized setup assistance.

faqs.question: Do you offer volume discounts?
faqs.answer: Enterprise pricing is available for high-volume users. Contact sales@omxdigital.ai for custom quotes.

faqs.question: What integrations are available?
faqs.answer: Both OMX Sales and Flow integrate with Shopify, Zapier, Salesforce, and HubSpot. Full API documentation is available.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Our web app is fully mobile-responsive. Native iOS/Android apps are launching Q1 2024.
